events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
System has classified the customer's inquiry as a refund request due to mention of receiving the wrong item and requesting money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund process related to the wrong item delivery.
Hello! I’m Sarah, and I’m here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number to get started?
To process your refund quickly, please send us pictures of the product you received along with the packaging and your order confirmation.
Here is the order number 54321 and attached images showing the wrong product and its packaging. I hope this helps to speed up the refund.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide a return label for the incorrect item shipping.
Thanks for the quick response and solution, I appreciate the refund offer and the convenient return process.
The refund has been processed successfully and a prepaid return label sent to the customer's email. We consider this case resolved.
Checking in to confirm you received your refund and did not experience any further issues with your order or returns.
The customer confirmed satisfaction with the refund process. We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
